name: Design System DEMO

Building a design system can be an overwhelming experience. This file is a simple version based on flow with just a few screens. Bear in mind that you should always create your system with a team, speak with developers and other designers when you do so. It is just a context if you are beginning your adventure and hopefully, will help you understand the basics concepts of a design system.
